<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 331 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You unleash a beam of divine energy. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity or if your deity is true neutral. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target's AC. On a hit, the target takes damage of the chosen alignment type equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier (double damage on a critical hit). The spell gains the trait of the alignment you chose.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d4.
name: Divine Lance
